mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT( SELLER_ID, IMG_ID, TITLE, CATEGORY, QUALITY_CONDITION, PRICE, DESCRIPTION, STATUS ) VALUES( #{sellerId}, #{imgId}, #{title}, #{category}, #{qualityCondition}, #{price}, #{description}, #{status} )
mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCT_ID, SELLER_ID, IMG_ID, PRICE, DESCRIPTION, QUALITY_CONDITION, CATEGORY, READ_COUNT, STATUS, TITLE, CREATED_AT, VALIDATED_YN FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}
